alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Nicholas (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 11:55PM EDT until May 20 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Nicholas County in central Kentucky... Northeastern Harrison County in central Kentucky... * Until 1230 AM EDT. * At 1155 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cynthiana, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Nicholas and northeastern Harrison Counties, including the following locations... Robinson, Oddville, Ellisville, Pleasant Valley, Claysville, Barefoot, Garnett, Morning Glory, Kelat and Venus. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
